newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Deutsche Morgan Grenfell HK appoints stock chiefs.
newsitem.headline: Deutsche Morgan Grenfell HK appoints stock chiefs.

text.p: Deutsche Bank said on Monday its brokerage arm Deutsche Morgan Grenfell had appointed senior stock executives based in Hong Kong.
Lawrence Ang will join as head of China research by mid-February from BZW Asia where he holds a similar position, the bank said in a statement.
Victor Kwok joined Deutsche Morgan Grenfell as head of Hong Kong research on January 1. Previously, he was the regional head of property research of SBC Warburg, it said.
Daniel Poon came from HG Asia to be head of Hong Kong/China sales, and Jeffrey Hil joined as senior salesman for Hong Kong/China from HG Asia.
